Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add PDF extraction document processing pipeline

Implement the first example pipeline with:
- Docker-based containerization using slim Python image
- Support for PDF, DOCX, PPTX, text, and image files \(OCR\)
- Ollama integration for AI-powered document analysis
- Standard /data/input and /data/output directories
- Environment variables for external service configuration
- Comprehensive extraction and processing modules
- Docker Compose orchestration for easy deployment

Resolves #1

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
